Literature.Title: Structure-activity relations of parasin I, a histone H2A-derived antimicrobial peptide
Literature.Author: Kim SC, Cho JH, Park CB, Kim KS, Jang SA, Yu BJ, Park IY, Kim JM, Koo YS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus mutans ATCC 25175(MIC=2µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 62037(MIC=1µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 15752(MIC=4µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 27325(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas putida ATCC 17426(MIC=1µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MIC=4µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 34881(MIC=1µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae ATCC 44774(MIC=1µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=1µg/ml)
